title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
9 - 8 - 7 - 6 points: Stronger Essays

  1. Addresses the terms of the question - analyzes specific policies of TWO rulers in relation to Machiavelli's suggestion and indicates degree which each is lionlike or foxlike.

  2. Strong thesis may be implied within the terms of the question.

  3. Analysis measured by explaining connections between Machiavelli and the policies: Development of argument in the context of the question.

  4. Well-organized, on the whole.

  5. Offers specific and relevant examples, accurately articulated to support both similarities and differences.

  6. Essays in the upper ranges will demonstrate greater sophistication.

  7. There may be some error in the group; even a "9" need not be flawless.

5 - 4 points: Mixed Essays

  1. Shows come implicit understanding of the question.

  2. Responds to the terms of the question unevenly: focuses on only one ruler.

    • describes policies rather than analyzing them.

    • implicitly relates the policies of the ruler/rulers to Machiavelli.

  3. Limited specific information — some possibly irrelevant.

  4. Somewhat unfocused — emphasizing one aspect of the question.

  5. This group may contain errors, factual and/or interpretive.

3 - 2 - 1 - 0 points: Weaker Essays

  1. These essays often simply restate the question with little supporting evidence.

  2. May generally describe the rulers or Machiavelli without focus on the question.

  3. Supporting information, if any, may be superficial or irrelevant; may use few examples or illustrations, but fail to relate them to the question.

  4. Will have little or no substance other than general knowledge about the rulers or Machiavelli.

  5. Essays in the lower ranges will misunderstand the question.

  6. Essays ranked as "0" or "1" may attempt to address the question, but fail to do so.

  7. May contain significant errors.

Non-responsive Essays should be scored " — "

Response totally off task, absent, or irrelevant. May be assigned by any reader, after checking all pages of essay booklet for a rankable response.
